original_title: Death In June: Lives At The Edge Of The World
overview: Live, Brest / France 10-XII-11 / 7-V-05 / 10-IV-02.  45 different songs  81 different performances  Massive gallery of unseen photos + poster.  Death In June is Douglas P. aided on these occasions by John Murphy.  2002 performance features special guest Boyd Rice.
title: Death In June: Lives At The Edge Of The World
